name: Escape the water
description:
A water wall is behind you! You need to run as far as you can!

  • ⎵ to change lane
  • ← and → to move

- The game starts when you start moving
- The game stop when you touch a bomb or the water wall
- The game was created in less than 3 hours, using my own game framework, minigdx: https://minigdx.github.io/minigdx-showcase/
- The assets are from Kenny 1 bits pack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
- Yes, the blue cube should represent water 🌊
- Sorry: no time to add any graphic interface  🙈
